FEDORA-2024-821c085a14 (open62541-1.4.8-1.fc41) has been submitted as an update to Fedora 41.
https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2024-821c085a14

FEDORA-2024-821c085a14 has been pushed to the Fedora 41 testing repository.
Soon you'll be able to install the update with the following command:
`sudo dnf upgrade --enablerepo=updates-testing --refresh --advisory=FEDORA-2024-821c085a14`
You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2024-821c085a14

See also https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for more information on how to test updates.

FEDORA-2024-821c085a14 (open62541-1.4.8-1.fc41) has been pushed to the Fedora 41 stable repository.
If problem still persists, please make note of it in this bug report.

bugs.title: CVE-2024-53429 open62541: assertion failure in fuzz_binary_decode leads to crash [fedora-41]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2024-53429 open62541: assertion failure in fuzz_binary_decode leads to crash [fedora-41]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2024-53429 open62541: assertion failure in fuzz_binary_decode leads to crash

long_desc.thetext: Open62541 v1.4.6 is has an assertion failure in fuzz_binary_decode, which leads to a crash.

More information about this security flaw is available in the following bug:

https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2327816

Disclaimer: Community trackers are created by Red Hat Product Security team on a best effort basis. Package maintainers are required to ascertain if the flaw indeed affects their package, before starting the update process.

FEDORA-2024-821c085a14 (open62541-1.4.8-1.fc41) has been submitted as an update to Fedora 41.
https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2024-821c085a14

FEDORA-2024-821c085a14 has been pushed to the Fedora 41 testing repository.
Soon you'll be able to install the update with the following command:
`sudo dnf upgrade --enablerepo=updates-testing --refresh --advisory=FEDORA-2024-821c085a14`
You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2024-821c085a14

See also https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for more information on how to test updates.

FEDORA-2024-821c085a14 (open62541-1.4.8-1.fc41) has been pushed to the Fedora 41 stable repository.
If problem still persists, please make note of it in this bug report.

comments.text: This update has been submitted for testing by pbrobinson.
This update's test gating status has been changed to 'ignored'.
This update has been pushed to testing.
This update has been submitted for stable by bodhi.
This update has been pushed to stable.
